ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like something from Knights of the Dinner Table . Perhaps in the issue with the monestary with all the old books and furniture that our intrepid
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like something from "Knights of the Dinner Table".

Perhaps in the issue with the monestary with all the old books and
furniture that our intrepid adventurers decided to take back to town
to sell for grevious amounts of money.

Or is there some other llama goring incident I am otherwise unaware
of?

Gaspode Talechaser/Seali Baleno
E'ci

> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> careful, I heard somewhere that several Peruvian farmers were
gored to death
> by llamas.
>
> Kitasi
> Anyone out there recognize this reference?
>
